subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: McClain, who had a serious neck injury three years ago but came back to lead the Giants in tackles last season, will be sidelined indefinitely with a new neck injury that he sustained in a training camp practice.
snippet: McClain, who had a serious neck injury three years ago but came back to lead the Giants in tackles last season, will be sidelined indefinitely with a new neck injury that he sustained in a training camp practice.
